\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 17821}

\subsection*{False Positive for Opiates}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Aslanv}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 8 oz & oral & DXM & liquid\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 132.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Yesterday night I ingested 8 ozs of robotussin. I came home, and my parents were extremaly worried becuase of my slurred speach and incoherance. So they took me to the emergency room. In the emergency room I was givin a urinalysis, which came up positive for OPIATES!!!!!



I raised hell. I never used opiates, and am a recovering mental marijuana addict, who is currently in rehab so don't smoke. I raised hell and was givin a blood anylsis, which is still pending, these results were extremaly devastating to me. In fact I could be put in in-patient rehab. My parents think I am a heroin user now.

\end{document}
